pre_install:
# Create the installation script
        echo '$antLibPath = "$env:USERPROFILE\scoop\apps\ant\current\lib"' | out-file $dir\install-apache-ivy.ps1
        echo 'Write-Host -fore blue "Copying ivy-$version.jar to $antLibPath"' | out-file $dir\install-apache-ivy.ps1 -append
        echo 'Copy-Item "$dir\ivy-$version.jar" $antLibPath' | out-file $dir\install-apache-ivy.ps1 -append

        # Create the uninstallation script
        echo '$antLibPath = "$env:USERPROFILE\scoop\apps\ant\current\lib"' | out-file $dir\uninstall-apache-ivy.ps1
        echo 'Write-Host -fore blue "Removing ivy-$version.jar from $antLibPath"' | out-file $dir\uninstall-apache-ivy.ps1 -append
        echo 'Remove-Item -force $antLibPath\ivy-$version.jar' | out-file $dir\uninstall-apache-ivy.ps1 -append
